description: This file declares internal API functions for the Sys Rro Bool Object, which appears to be part of a system component related to boolean record handling within the BroadWay Runtime System environment.

methods.name: SysRroBoolGetRecordData
methods.description: Retrieves the data record associated with the boolean object.

methods.name: SysRroBoolSetRecordData
methods.description: Sets the data record for the boolean object.

methods.name: SysRroBoolGetRecordValue
methods.description: Retrieves the boolean value from the record.

methods.name: SysRroBoolSetRecordValue
methods.description: Sets the boolean value in the record.
